title: Arniston memoirs
snippet: First Clerks of Advocates ; three and three. " The procession proceeded down the Fishmarket Close, up the Horse Wynd, and along by the front of the College, to the Lord President's house in Adam Square, where it went round the Square till the corpse was brought out. Immediately after this the mutes, etc., proceeded forward to Nicolson Street, where the hearse waited.
